purpose: To provide a comprehensive learning pathway for individuals seeking to gain knowledge and skills in various fields of artificial intelligence and machine learning, from foundational concepts to advanced techniques.
principle: The repository is built on the principle of open-source education, allowing learners to access resources freely and contribute to the knowledge base.
reusability: The materials and resources provided in this repository are designed to be reusable across different learning scenarios, enabling users to adapt content for personal or educational use.
limitations: The repository is currently in alpha status, which means that some resources may be incomplete or in development. Users should be aware that the learning path may evolve over time.
name: AI-ML-Roadmap-from-scratch
description: Become skilled in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Generative AI, Deep Learning, Data Science, Natural Language Processing, Reinforcement Learning and more with this complete 0 to 100 repository.
language: The repository includes content in multiple programming languages such as Python, TypeScript, and Java, among others, catering to a wide audience with varying preferences.
